abilities.description: When cast on an ally, grants them 7 armor, 70 attack speed, and 15% movement speed. When cast on an enemy, removes 7 armor, 70 attack speed, and 15% movement speed. Removes the armor from the caster when used. Cannot target spell immune enemies.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
72 mana, 0.3 mana regeneration and 0.6% flat base magic resistance.
6 main attack damage to all / / heroes.
12.6 main attack damage to universal heroes.
name: Solar Crest
description: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.
